duties_responsibilities.duty: Enter prescription information including patient searches, prescriber searches, drug selection, and insurance billing.
Retrieve medication from inventory and create prescription labels.
Assist in maintaining the Pharmacy department by keeping it clean and in order.
Assist in inventory management processes including order review, inventory returns, and restocking shelves.
Administer pharmacy programs including: FlavoRx, Living More, etc.
Work flexible hours including weekdays, weekends, evening shifts, and some holidays.

education_certification.credential: H.S. Diploma or General Education Degree (GED) required.
Pharmacy Technician state and/or national certification.
